explains: n. 虚弱；弱点；意志薄弱

sentences.en: She died after a long period of increasing frailty.
sentences.cn: 她日益虚弱，经过一段长时间后去世了。

sentences.en: Increasing frailty meant that she was more and more confined to bed.
sentences.cn: 日益衰弱意味着她愈来愈需要卧床。

sentences.en: This human frailty has profound consequences.
sentences.cn: 人性的这一弱点具有深远的影响。
